name: Arcade Simulator
description:
Arcade Simulator is a game that will help you remember the era of arcade machines. Play in 20 arcade machines with your own games, get achievements, climb the leaderboard and become the best player in this game room!

In the virtual game room, you can play various games, starting with games in the style of the 90s and ending with 3D games in different genres: racing, shooters, casual and classic arcade games. On it, you can watch the statistics of each game, turn on your music in the hall and enjoy the nostalgia of arcade machines.

Key Features:

  • 20 arcade machines with different games.
  • 60+ achievements.
  • Leaderboards.
